ygData.subject: RE: You won't believe this crap
ygData.msgSnippet: I think he responded to that before. Can t remember when, just search deja news. Of course he will havea few extra s and what not. He is, after all, the
ygData.messageBody:
I think he responded to that before. Can't remember when, just search deja
news.

Of course he will havea few extra's and what not. He is, after all, the
executive producer. However, I doubt very much that he abuses his power,
and probably plays and dies much the same way we all do.

As for GM's, well, thats another story, needless to say, I am less than
pleased with them and their "help". But, I'd rather dwell on playing and
having fun. If other players twink, including Brad and GM's, that doesn't
bother me, as long as it doesn't ruin my enjoyment of the game.

-----Original Message-----
From: John E. Maynus [mailto:jmaynus@...]
Sent: 1999/11/03 1:19 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Cc: EQ_Cleric@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] You won't believe this crap


I can't believe the screen shot I saw on www.eqvault.com it was a pic of
Brad's character dead. It wasn't the being dead part I couldn't believe but
what it was he had in his hand. Now remember his character is a Ranger, pic
shows him wearing the new Ranger armor but in his hand was the SoulFire
which is a Pally only weapon. Can we say cheating? Now if one of us tried
that crap we'd get banned from the game but he can wield a Pally only weapon
when he's a Ranger?
That shows me the ppl like Brad and GM can get away with anything in the
game. I also read on the EQ newsgroup that last Sunday the night of the
events that the GM's were doing things that they've told players not to do
and if they did they'd get banned for it. Heard they were camping at zone
points waiting for a player to zone over and kill them and also camping
binding points and killing someone over and over everytime he/she died and
came back at their bind point till they got ticked and pulled the plug on
their modems. If we would do that junk we'd get banned for it.
Can't wait to hear what Brad has to say about him wielding a SoulFire.

**************************
Azor Spellbound
Lvl 24 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************
